name: Geometrix (Doctore)
description:
"Geometrix" is a puzzle-platformer with lots of restrictions. You play as one of four geometric forms  (sphere, square, triangle, polygon) and try to make your way through the levels. Each geometric from has it's own abilities which are needed to get the level done. BUT: You're only allowed to switch from a certain amount per level.  Furthermore, in some levels there are other restrictions such as a limit of jumps e.g. Have lot's of fun!

Update to Version 1.1:

  • Glitches on player movement corrected
  • Bugs on jumping and pushing objects corrected
  • Bugs on bullet-physics corrected
  • Separated download files for each platform (MacOS, Win, Linux)
  • Linus as target-platform added (Beta / experimental)
  • Added more level and polished the existing one a bit

Update to Version 1.1.1:

  • Just another quick fix on jumping and ground collision
  • Level 5 should now work correctly
